page.title: 13THE NEW HOUSING ESTATE
page.content: This area is the largest area of growth in Slough at present. The land originally belonged to Eton College and was sold to Slough Council. Lovell Homes bought all the land and later sold parts of it to other companies because it was too expensive to develop.The following are examples of what property is being developed. Lovell Homes: 1 Bed Flats Â£37000 2 Bed House Â£43750+ 3 Bed House Â£49000+ 4 Bed House t.b.a. Wimpey: A range of property from 1 Bed Flats to 3 Bed Houses, Â£36895-Â£46995. Matthew Homes: 1 Bed Flats and 2 Bed Houses,16 weeks to build;prices include carpets,d.glazing,kitchen equipment and gas c/h.Â£31000-Â£46000. Maclean: Detached and semi detached houses Â£28000-Â£55000.
